  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/exercises/favorites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retourne tous les exercices marqués comme favoris par l'utilisateur connecté

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Liste des exercices favoris retournée avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"favorites":{"description":"Liste des exercices favoris avec détails","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exercise":{"description":"Informations de l'exercice","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant de l'exercice","example":"exe_123456789"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Nom de l'exercice","example":"Squats au poids du corps"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description détaillée de l'exercice","example":"Exercice de renforcement pour les jambes et les fessiers"},"imageUrl":{"type":"string","description":"URL de l'image de l'exercice","example":"https://fitme-app.com/images/exercises/squats.jpg"},"durationMinutes":{"type":"number","description":"Durée recommandée en minutes","example":15},"formattedDuration":{"type":"string","description":"Durée formatée","example":"15min"},"intensity":{"type":"string","enum":["VERY_LOW","LOW","MODERATE","HIGH","VERY_HIGH"],"description":"Niveau d'intensité","example":"MODERATE"},"intensityLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label d'intensité en français","example":"Modérée"},"muscleZone":{"type":"string","enum":["UPPER_BODY","LOWER_BODY","CORE","FULL_BODY","CARDIO","FLEXIBILITY","BALANCE"],"description":"Zone musculaire travaillée","example":"LOWER_BODY"},"muscleZoneLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label de zone musculaire en français","example":"Bas du corps"},"isFavorite":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indique si l'exercice est dans les favoris","example":true},"averageRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note moyenne de l'exercice","example":4.3},"totalRatings":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total d'évaluations","example":127},"userRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note donnée par l'utilisateur actuel","example":5},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de création","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de dernière modification","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","title","formattedDuration","intensityLabel","muscleZoneLabel","isFavorite","averageRating","totalRatings","createdAt","updatedAt"],"title":"ExerciseDetailsDto"}]},"addedToFavoritesAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date d'ajout aux favoris","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"averageRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note moyenne de l'exercice","example":4.3},"totalRatings":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total d'évaluations","example":127},"userRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note donnée par l'utilisateur","example":5}},"required":["exercise","addedToFavoritesAt","averageRating","totalRatings"],"title":"FavoriteExerciseDto"}},"total":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total d'exercices favoris","example":12}},"required":["favorites","total"],"title":"FavoriteExercisesResponseDto"}}}},"401":{"description":"Non autorisé - token JWT requis"}}}
